destillapp.title: DestillApp
destillapp.description:
A full-stack application designed to manage and document the distillation of aromatic plants. 
The system centralizes plant data, distillation batches, results, and user settings ‚Äî offering an efficient workflow for small-scale distillation studios or botanical research environments. 
Built with a modern TypeScript‚Äìpowered Vue 3 frontend and a GraphQL API backend, DestillationApp delivers a clean, structured, and reliable tool for handling the entire distillation lifecycle. 
Designed and implemented end-to-end as a solo project ‚Äî from concept and architecture to API design, UI development, documentation, and deployment preparation.

wallet-app.title: Wallet App
wallet-app.description:
A full-stack personal finance manager designed to help users track income, expenses, and spending habits in a clear, intuitive interface. 
The application offers secure authentication, interactive charts, real-time currency conversion, and a clean UX optimized for quick daily use. 
Developed as part of the GoIT course, based on a provided Figma design, and built independently as a complete end-to-end product ‚Äî from architecture to deployment.

filmoteka.title: Filmoteka
filmoteka.description:
A team project as part of the GOIT course, creating a dynamic movie search application with trailer previews, detailed film information, and a personalized watchlist feature. 
Built using vanilla JavaScript with Axios for API communication, it follows a mobile-first approach and provides a responsive, interactive interface. 
Users can search for films, watch trailers, explore detailed descriptions, and manage their personal ‚Äúwatched‚Äù or ‚Äúto-watch‚Äù lists. 
This project demonstrates practical teamwork, frontend logic implementation, and integration of third-party libraries for UI and pagination enhancements.

icecream-shop.title: Icecream Shop
icecream-shop.description:
